title: Desert stories (A)
creator_credit: Lindsay Frazer, Nick Frazer, Channel 0-28 and KOKO P
brief_description: The Pintubi Aboriginal people of the Northern Territory tell stories of the Dreamtime, and other stories of their lives. Also shows the work of the Papunya Aboriginal Settlement Literature Production Centre in recording the Pintubi people in their own language. Care is taken that the oral tradition is retained, when transcribing the stories.
